name: The Shift-A-Ning
description:
Can you survive the 20 waves!? Dodge multiple projectiles while gaining abilities as you fight through waves of enemies and levels up. Beware you can only move/teleport by using the SHIFT key. #retro #action #strategy #BulletHell

The floor is lava but you have 2 emergency teleports but if your Health hit 0 it's game over!

Have fun and drop a like if you enjoyed the game!! More updates are coming soon!!!

Buffs:

Attack Buff: Increases attack speed

Float Buff: Increases hover time

Abilities:

Shield - Activates while S is held down. Continuously drains stamina.

Explosive Shot - Unlocks at level 5. While D is held down you switch your projectile with an explosive one that deals damage to multiple enemies at once. Drains stamina with each shot.

Phase Passive - Unlocks at level 8. Upon teleporting you leave a Phase of yourself to be targeted by enemies

Shadow Clone - Unlocks at level 10. Activates when W is pressed and teleports to the mouse location. Leaves behind a clone that mimics your attacks. Uses 25% of your stamina to activate and goes on a 10 second cool down.
